item.title: Roblox: Anime Defense RNG Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Anime Defense RNG Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Anime Defense RNG
  • How to Get More Anime Defense RNG Codes

Anime Defense RNG is a Roblox game that will keep you hooked for hours without even blinking an eye. Thanks to the successful combination of genres, the game is never boring. It features RNG rolls that allow you to obtain various anime characters, and tower defense, where you use these characters.

All this is complemented by well-thought-out game mechanics and a chic, high-quality visual style. In addition, the developers of Anime Defense RNG have added the ability to redeem codes, so be sure to take advantage of this and get free rewards.

Updated July 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Anime Defense RNG has three working codes you can redeem to claim various goodies. These rewards will help you progress much faster. Codes for this game usually don't stay active for a long time, that's why you must use them quickly. We’ll keep tracking new codes as they arrive, so be sure to revisit this article often for more free rewards.

All Anime Defense RNG Codes

Working Anime Defense RNG Codes

  • UPDATE0.5 - Use this code to get free rewards. (NEW)
  • 45KLIKES - Use this code to get free rewards. (NEW)
  • 25KFAVS - Use this code to get free rewards. (NEW)

Expired Anime Defense RNG Codes

  • 7.5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 15 Scrolls, 5 Super Scrolls, and 15 Cubes. (NEW)
  • 5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 250 Gems, 25 Cubes, 25 Scrolls, 10 Super Scrolls, 10 Luck Potion, 10 Roll Potion, and 10 Yen Potion.
  • 2.5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 150 Gems, 15 Cubes, 15 Scrolls, and 5 Super Scrolls.
  • 1KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 125 Gems, 10 Cubes, and 10 Scrolls.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 150 Gems, 5 Luck Potion, 5 Roll Potion, and 5 Yen Potion.

As a reward for redeeming Anime Defense RNG codes, you will receive a bunch of different potions. The rewards also include scrolls, cubes, and, of course, in-game currency. All of this will help you get better characters, improve existing ones, and buy some useful items in the store.

How to Redeem Codes in Anime Defense RNG

As with most Roblox games, redeeming codes in Anime Defense RNG is straightforward. You simply need to access the menu located within the game interface. However, if you are new to such games, you may require assistance in obtaining rewards, so we have created a guide to assist you in redeeming codes in Anime Defense RNG .

  • Launch Roblox and open Anime Defense RNG .
  • Look at the upper-left corner of the screen. You will see a button with three lines next to the chat button. Click on it to open additional options.
  • Among the options, there is a Codes button in the form of a ticket. Click on it.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click Redeem.

Remember that all codes may expire over time, so redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Anime Defense RNG Codes

You will find more Roblox codes if you bookmark this guide to your browser. You can also visit the developers' web resources:

  • Anime Defense RNG Roblox game page
  • Anime Defense RNG Roblox group
  • Anime Defense RNG Discord server
  • Anime Defense RNG Roblox X page

item.title: Roblox: Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Sing It Karaoke Battles
  • How to Get More Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

Sing It Karaoke Battles is literally karaoke in the form of a Roblox experience, which already has more than 900 songs that you can sing alone or compete with others. In competitive mode, each player will get their moment of glory, and the one who scores the most Cheers wins.

Cheers is the main currency in the game, which acts as rating points and your ranking in the leaderboard. In addition to participating in karaoke battles, you can get Cheers by redeeming Sing It Karaoke Battles codes, which is a great alternative.

Updated July 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Sing It Karaoke Battles has a fresh code you can exchange for awesome freebies. On top of that, several older codes reward you with all sorts of useful bonuses. Make sure to redeem them on time, as they may expire extremely fast. Feel free to check back soon, as more offers may be added in future updates.

All Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

Working Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

  • 100MilVisits - Redeem this code to get free rewards. (NEW)
  • JUSTSINGTHESONG - Redeem this code to get "#NOFREESTYLE" and "JustSingTheSong" Titles.
  • release - Redeem this code to get 100 Cheers.
  • newmap - Redeem this code to get 300 Cheers.
  • ilovesingit - Redeem this code to get "I

Expired Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

There are currently no expired Sing It Karaoke Battles codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Sing It Karaoke Battles codes will bring you not only Cheers, but also other useful rewards. It all depends on the code, but in addition to the aforementioned currency, you can also get, for example, a title that you can then equip to stand out from the crowd.

How to Redeem Codes for Sing It Karaoke Battles

Redeeming Sing It Karaoke Battles codes will take you a few seconds. The redemption option is simple and straightforward, just like in most other Roblox games, but if you are having difficulty, here is a guide to help you know how to proceed:

  • Launch Sing It Karaoke Battles .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the first one which says Shop.
  • This will open the Shop menu. Here, interact with the Promo Codes option. The corresponding button is located in the upper right corner of the menu.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a colored Enter button below it. Now, enter one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, press the colored Enter button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Sing It Karaoke Battles Codes

Sing It Karaoke Battles codes are very valuable, so it's no surprise that each one is a one-time use. If you have used all the Roblox codes on your account and want more, you can look for them on the official pages of the game. From time to time, the developers share various announcements and news here, including codes.

  • Official Sing It Karaoke Battles Roblox group.
  • Official Sing It Karaoke Battles Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Horse Life Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Horse Life Codes
  • How to Redeem Horse Life Codes
  • How to Get New Horse Life Codes

Horse Life is an amazing Roblox experience where you can tame and ride lots of different horses. The game has many types of animals that you can catch and most of them are based on various mythological creatures. Also, this experience features promo codes that you can use to get free rewards. In this guide, we will list all Horse Life codes and tell you how to redeem them in-game.

Updated July 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Horse Life currently has two working codes that will offer you incredible rewards. So, if you want to get some free stuff, make sure to redeem them on time, as they are likely to become inactive pretty fast. On top of that, if you're looking for even more awesome goodies, make sure to bookmark this page, as we regularly update it with the latest codes.

All Horse Life Codes

Working Horse Life Codes

  • HappyPride25 - Use this code to get free rewards. (NEW)
  • Uranium – Gives you x5 Green Apples.

Expired Horse Life Codes

  • MonthlyMission – Gives you x4 Master Lasso and 3 Instant Foal Potions.
  • 100ktwitter – Gives you x1 Name Tag and x1 Color Dye.

There are many ways to customize your horses in Horse Life . One of them is to give your horse a name. Of course, you can change it, and if you want to do so, you will need to use a special item called Name Tag. This thing can be obtained in different ways, including redeeming promo codes.

Codes in Horse Life can expire, just like in other Roblox games. So, if you don’t redeem them in time, you will be left without these bonuses. Don't wait too long and redeem the promo codes as soon as possible before they become unavailable.

How to Redeem Horse Life Codes

In order to use codes in Roblox games, you will need to learn how to redeem them. In Horse Life , the process can be done through a special menu, and it can be quite problematic to find. Here is a list of steps you need to follow to redeem promo codes in Horse Life and claim your rewards:

  • Launch Horse Life and wait for the experience to load.
  • After that, you will find yourself at the spawn point. There. you will need to search for a big gift with the words “Login Rewards” written above it.
  • Approach this gift and interact with it.
  • After that, you will see a menu that has two buttons on the right. Click on the Codes button.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem in the Redeem Codes tab you just opened.
  • Click on the Redeem button.

How to Get New Horse Life Codes

This guide will be updated with new Roblox codes if they are added to the game. You can use our guide as a source of information about new free bonuses. Also, you can follow the official media related to Horse Life :

  • YouTube Channel
  • Discord Server

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Steam Page Just Got 5 Manual Updates
item.description:
The Steam page of Hollow Knight: Silksong has received five manual updates in the last two days, as spotted by fans of the popular franchise. Hollow Knight: Silksong is easily one of the most eagerly awaited games of all time, and fans often experience a mixture of excitement and disbelief when any news about the title surfaces.

Released by Team Cherry in 2017, the original Hollow Knight is often considered one of the best Metroidvania games ever made. Hollow Knight: Silksong was originally announced in 2019, and fans have often believed that its release was just around the corner since then. Unfortunately, years have passed, and the game does not have an official release date yet. Back in April, it was at least confirmed that Hollow Knight: Silksong would be out in 2025 during the Nintendo Direct event.

Now, fans have discovered that Hollow Knight: Silksong ’s Steam page gained five manual updates in less than 48 hours. According to SteamDB, the first of these updates happened on July 2, and it was followed by two on July 3 and two more on the following day. While this does not mean much by itself, it’s certainly something that caught the attention of the fanbase. Fans on social media were divided, with some mildly excited about these updates, while others remained skeptical. Some even joked that the game would be out “tomorrow,” making fun of how hopeful the fanbase once was.

Fans React to Hollow Knight: Silksong's Steam Page Getting 5 Manual Updates in Just 2 Days

Understandably, fans are tired of waiting for Hollow Knight: Silksong . Back in April, for example, Hollow Knight: Silksong ’s page had a few Steam updates, and excited fans were disappointed to see that the title had still not been released around three months after these updates.

At least, as shown in the recent Xbox Games Showcase, Hollow Knight: Silksong will launch before the release of ROG Xbox Ally, which is scheduled to be out late in 2025. Obviously, delays can always happen, but it’s unlikely that the game would be featured in so many presentations if Team Cherry was not confident that the project was finally nearing its launch.

It’s still unknown how Hollow Knight: Silksong will compare to its predecessor. The original Hollow Knight was largely considered one of the most influential Metroidvania games ever, so the fanbase will certainly be expecting an amazing experience. In any case, it’s possible that the title will be a big hit, and hopefully it’ll really come out in the next few months.

item.title: Zelda on Switch 2 Can't Repeat One of Breath of the Wild, Tears of the Kingdom's Best Immersion Tricks
item.description:
Recent Zelda games have consistently nailed immersion by tying in-game tools directly to real-world hardware. The Sheikah Slate that Link used in Breath of the Wild to take pictures, access the map, and activate shrines looked like a real-life Wii U GamePad. In Tears of the Kingdom , the updated Purah Pad looked exactly like a Nintendo Switch. It made players feel like Link was holding the same tech they were, which created a fun connection between the real world and Hyrule.

This has become one of the most exciting parts of a new Zelda title. Players get to discover a new in-game tool that feels unique to each era and hardware. But this trick won’t land a third time, as the Switch 2 looks nearly identical to the original Switch. A new tablet based on the Switch 2 would feel like a lazy copy-paste of the Purah Pad, because Nintendo has no new console form factor to base it on. However, there are ways to deliver something fresh by embracing the new console's distinct features.

Switch 2 Features That Can Be Incorporated Into the Next In-Game Tablet

the

One of the biggest upgrades for the Switch 2 is mouse control support when the Joy-Cons are detached. This can be directly incorporated into Link’s next core device, as the in-game tablet could feature detachable sides that function like magical pointers or control sticks. With these, Link could zoom in on Hyrule’s terrain, drag and drop items in inventory, or trace a route across a map to automatically set waypoints.

Another major upgrade is Switch 2's improved microphone. The next tablet could take advantage of this with a voice-controlled interface. Instead of navigating menus, players could speak commands like “Open map,” “Mark location,” “Take picture,” or “Activate shrine.” This makes sense both thematically and mechanically. Zelda games already play with magical voice and sound motifs, like howling in Twilight Princess , and instrument commands in Ocarina of Time . Voice input in a Zelda game wouldn’t feel like a gimmick; it would feel like spellcasting.

The Tools Have Always Tied Into In-Game Lore

Zelda games have done an incredible job of incorporating these gadgets as part of the world’s mythos. The Sheikah Slate was invented, and then Purah created the more advanced Purah Pad based on it. That’s why the two look similar. Zelda then takes the Pad back in time, where a construct guards it for centuries until it returns to Link in Tears of the Kingdom . The story justifies its redesign. So, if Nintendo simply slaps a slightly modified tablet into the next game, it will disrupt the logic that the last two games carefully built. Players expect more, not just in terms of functionality, but also a justifaction of why the tool exists in that world.

Switch 2 Doesn’t Have to be Incorporated as Another Tablet

Every major Zelda game has introduced a core mechanic that reflects its console’s identity, but it isn’t limited to tablets. Skyward Sword used motion controls to turn swordplay into a real-time precision system. Phantom Hourglass on the DS let players use the stylus to draw a path for the boomerang, trace symbols to open doors, and hold the stylus to charge hammer attacks. Similarly, Spirit Tracks used the microphone to blow a spirit flute.

Switch 2’s mouse control opens the door for new tool types that feel equally tailored to the hardware. One standout idea is a magical levitating dagger, similar to Yondu’s arrow from the Guardians of the Galaxy movies, that can be steered in real time using Joy-Con pointer input. It could slice through enemies or be used in puzzles, such as triggering switches in a specific order or disabling traps from a distance. New puzzle shrines could ask players to draw ancient glyphs or magic seals with pinpoint accuracy using the Joy-Con as a stylus replacement. Even ranged combat could evolve. A new scoped bow could offer pinpoint aiming, using the Joy-Con for sniper-like precision. These kinds of tools would breathe new life into Zelda ’s core mechanics and reinforce what the series does best: merging new hardware features with clever, meaningful gameplay.

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is the sequel to the beloved open-world adventure, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. This installment once again sees Link and Zelda battling to protect Hyrule from falling to Ganondorf. This new adventure takes place in the same land of Hyrule as Breath of the Wild but sees something called the Upheaval, which allows link to travel to Sky Islands, as well as deep into the Depths beneath Hyrule. Players can use special abilities to fuse together weapons, and build items to help them progress through the release.
